pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Anthropic Python SDKThis python repo provides access to Anthropic's safety-first language model APIs.For more information on our APIs, please check out [Anthropic's documentation](https://console.anthropic.com/docs).## How to use```pip install .export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY=<insert token here>python examples/basic_sync.pypython examples/basic_stream.pypython examples/count_tokens.py```
